StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [DailyPacExpira.onDateCheck]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@DaysPrior int = 1 AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @Now date, @Cuto. date SET @Now = GETDATE() SET @Cuto. = DATEADD(DAY, -@DaysPrior, @Now)
SELECT ProspectId INTO #ProspectList FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect WHERE Expira.onDate < @Now AND Expira.onDate >= @Cuto. AND ProspectDisposi.onId = 2 AND SubSta.onType = 'E' AND Ac.ve = 1 AND NwaId IS NULL
BEGIN TRAN
INSERT INTO [USMC].[ProspectStatusHistory] ([ProspectID] ,[Disposi.onID] ,[UpdateUserID] ,[UpdateDate] ,[rowguid]) SELECT ProspectId ,5 ,'AAAABBBB-CCCC-DDDD-EEEE-FFFF00001111' ,GETDATE() ,NEWID() FROM #ProspectList
UPDATE Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect SET ProspectDisposi.onId = 5 FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p INNER JOIN #ProspectList l ON p.ProspectId = l.ProspectId
COMMIT
DROP TABLE #ProspectList
